import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Tabs from './Tabs'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; //import $ from './../../../node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min'; //for bootstrap.min.js //bootstrap-theme file for bootstrap 3 only // import './../../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; // import './../../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min'; import {acInsertProductsRequest} from './../../actions/index'; //window.$ = window.jQuery = require('./../../query'); class Content extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { id : '', name : '', } } submit = ()=>{ var parseJson = { id : this.state.id, value : this.state.name, }; this.props.onInsertProduct(parseJson); //window.$('#modal-id').modal('toggle'); } // console.log(this.props.history.match.params.id); onChange = (event) =>{ var target = event.target; var name = target.name; var value = target.value; this.setState({ [name] : value }) } render() { console.log('da vao content') return (

); } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch, props) =>{ console.log('dispatch'); return { onInsertProduct : (id) =>{ dispatch(acInsertProductsRequest(id)); } } } export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(Content);
